mapper.select: SELECT INDEX_TYPE, FORMAT_NAME, ES_BASE_URL, OUT_COL_IDS, OUT_COL_NAMES, out_col_types, DEF_COL_ID, DATE_FORMAT(DEF_FROMDT,'%Y-%m-%d%H%i') AS DEF_FROMDT, DATE_FORMAT(DEF_TODT,'%Y-%m-%d%H%i') AS DEF_TODT, TOTAL_ROW_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(OLDEST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OLDEST_DT, DATE_FORMAT(NEWEST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS NEWEST_DT FROM vw_srch_format_multi_mst WHERE 1=1 AND index_group = #{srch_index_type} ORDER BY SORTSEQ
SELECT INDEX_TYPE, COL_CD, COL_NM, TEXT_ALIGN, GRCODE, DSP_WIDTH, SEARCH_YN, SORTSEQ FROM srch_format_multi_det WHERE 1=1 AND INDEX_TYPE = #{srch_index_type} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORTSEQ

SELECT COL_CD AS CODE ,COL_NM AS CODENM_KOR ,COL_NM AS CODENM_ENG ,COL_NM AS CODENM_JPN FROM srch_format_multi_det WHERE 1=1 AND INDEX_TYPE = #{srch_index_type} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND SEARCH_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORTSEQ
